summary: Kaiji erased all of his debts in the first movie. A year later, he's back in the same debt ridden situation. Kaiji then gets a chance to clear himself of his 200 million Yen debt, but he has only 2 weeks.
cast: Tatsuya Fujiwara|Yûsuke Iseya|Yuriko Yoshitaka|Katsuhisa Namase|Teruyuki Kagawa|Shunsuke Itô|Hayato Kakizawa|Satoshi Koji|Suzuki Matsuo|Ken Mitsuishi|Yoshiyuki Morishita|Ryû Nakatani|Satoshi Nishikôri|Kyûsaku Shimada|Tarô Yamamoto
title: Kaiji 2: Jinsei dakkai gêmu
